tool.name: SAGA.sim_hydrology.0
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArraySTA_FC False isArraySTA_PWP False isArrayLANDUSE False isArrayDYN_CLIMATE False isArraySTA_KC False output_data_DYN_W $output_data_DYN_W name SAGA.sim_hydrology.0 STA_FC $STA_FC STA_FC_DEF $STA_FC_DEF STA_PWP $STA_PWP STA_PWP_DEF $STA_PWP_DEF LANDUSE $LANDUSE LANDUSE_DEF $LANDUSE_DEF DYN_CLIMATE $DYN_CLIMATE STA_KC $STA_KC prefer $prefer response $response outputType_DYN_W $OutputSection_DYN_W.outputType_DYN_W transmissionMode_DYN_W $OutputSection_DYN_W.transmissionMode_DYN_W

param.name: STA_FC
param.label: Field Capacity [mm]
param.help: Field Capacity [mm] The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff, png

param.name: STA_PWP
param.label: Permanent Wilting Point [mm]
param.help: Permanent Wilting Point [mm] The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff, png

param.name: LANDUSE
param.label: Land Use
param.help: Land Use The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff, png

param.name: DYN_CLIMATE
param.label: Climate Data
param.help: Climate Data The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: STA_KC
param.label: Crop Coefficients
param.help: Crop Coefficients The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_DYN_W
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: The WEELS (Wind Erosion on European Light Soils) soil moisture model dynamically calculates the soil moisture based on the rules proposed by the DVWK (1996) with input data about:<br/>- soil properties (grids: field capacity and permanent wilting point)<br/>- land use (grid: crop types)<br/>- climate (table: daily values of precipitation, temperature, air humidity)<br/><br/>References:<br/>- DVWK - Deutscher Verband fuer Wasserwirtschaft und Kulturbau e.V. (1996): 'Ermittlung der Verdunstung von Land- und Wasserflaechen', DVWK Merkblaetter 238/1996, Bonn, 135p.<br/>- Boehner, J., Schaefer, W., Conrad, O., Gross, J., Ringeler, A. (2001): 'The WEELS Model: methods, results and limits of wind erosion modelling', In: Catena, Special Issue<br/>
